movies.title: The Hungry Snake Woman
movies.plot: The Snake Queen returns in this bizarre horror fantasy. In this sequel to "Nyi Blorong" (1982 aka "The Snake Queen") Brian, a man who believes that money and power will win over the love of his girlfriend. While fleeing through the woods (after attempting rape his now-ex-girlfriend) he stumbles upon the Snake Queen who promises him great wealth if he does her bidding. However the evil hungry snake woman, who wants revenge against the Snake Queen, convinces Brian to trick the Queen by sticking a magic pin in her neck during love making turning her into a snake!
movies.simplePlot: The Snake Queen returns in this bizarre horror fantasy. In this sequel to "Nyi Blorong" (1982 aka "The Snake Queen") Brian, a man who believes that money and power will win over the love of...

biography.placeOfBirth: Buitenzorg, Buitenzorg, Dutch East Indies [now Bogor, West Java, Indonesia]
biography.bio: Suzzanna was born on October 14, 1942 in Buitenzorg, Buitenzorg, Dutch East Indies as Suzanna Martha Frederika van Osch. She was an actress, known for La reine de la magie noire (1983), Nyi blorong (1982) and Samson and Delilah (1987). She was married to Clift Sangra and Dicky Suprapto. She died on October 15, 2008 in Magelang, Central Java, Indonesia.
biography.name: Suzzanna

biography.bio: Advent Bangun was born as Advani Rangua. He is an actor, known for Koral le justicier (1984), Pembalasan si mata elang (1989) and Bangkitnya Si Mata Malaikat (1988).
biography.name: Advent Bangun

biography.bio: George Rudy was born on October 3, 1954 in Jember, East Java, Indonesia as George Rudyanto. He is an actor and writer, known for Misteri ronggeng (1991), Badai jalanan (1989) and Daerah jagoan (1991).
biography.name: George Rudy

biography.bio: Nina Anwar is an actress, known for Duel (1984), Maidens Revenge (1987) and Luka hati sang bidadari (1983).
biography.name: Nina Anwar
